self.name: messages.sendMessage
self.descriptionExcerpt: Sends a message to a chat

arguments.name: noWebpage
arguments.description: Set this flag to disable generation of the webpage preview

arguments.name: silent
arguments.description: Send this message silently (no notifications for the receivers)

arguments.name: peer
arguments.description: The destination where the message will be sent

arguments.name: replyToMsgId
arguments.description: The message ID to which this message will reply to

arguments.name: randomId
arguments.description: Unique client message ID required to prevent message resending

throws.description: The temporary auth key must be binded to the permanent auth key to use these methods.
throws.name: AUTH_KEY_PERM_EMPTY

throws.description: Bot domain invalid
throws.name: BOT_DOMAIN_INVALID

throws.description: This is not a valid bot
throws.name: BOT_INVALID

throws.description: The data of one or more of the buttons you provided is invalid
throws.name: BUTTON_DATA_INVALID

throws.description: The type of one or more of the buttons you provided is invalid
throws.name: BUTTON_TYPE_INVALID

throws.description: Button URL invalid
throws.name: BUTTON_URL_INVALID

throws.description: The provided channel is invalid
throws.name: CHANNEL_INVALID

throws.description: You haven't joined this channel/supergroup
throws.name: CHANNEL_PRIVATE

throws.description: You must be an admin in this chat to do this
throws.name: CHAT_ADMIN_REQUIRED

throws.description: The provided chat id is invalid
throws.name: CHAT_ID_INVALID

throws.description: You can't send messages in this chat, you were restricted
throws.name: CHAT_RESTRICTED

throws.description: You can't write in this chat
throws.name: CHAT_WRITE_FORBIDDEN

throws.description: The secret chat was declined
throws.name: ENCRYPTION_DECLINED

throws.description: You mentioned an invalid user
throws.name: ENTITY_MENTION_USER_INVALID

throws.description: Bots can't use fromMessage min constructors
throws.name: FROM_MESSAGE_BOT_DISABLED

throws.description: The specified user was deleted
throws.name: INPUT_USER_DEACTIVATED

throws.description: The provided message is empty
throws.name: MESSAGE_EMPTY

throws.description: The provided message is too long
throws.name: MESSAGE_TOO_LONG

throws.description: Provided reply_to_msg_id is invalid
throws.name: MSG_ID_INVALID

throws.description: The provided peer id is invalid
throws.name: PEER_ID_INVALID

throws.description: Too many pinned dialogs
throws.name: PINNED_DIALOGS_TOO_MUCH

throws.description: The provided reply markup is invalid
throws.name: REPLY_MARKUP_INVALID

throws.description: Bots cannot schedule messages
throws.name: SCHEDULE_BOT_NOT_ALLOWED

throws.description: You can't schedule a message this far in the future
throws.name: SCHEDULE_DATE_TOO_LATE

throws.description: There are too many scheduled messages
throws.name: SCHEDULE_TOO_MUCH

throws.description: Slowmode is enabled in this chat: you must wait for the specified number of seconds before sending another message to the chat.
throws.name: SLOWMODE_WAIT_X

throws.description: You're banned from sending messages in supergroups/channels
throws.name: USER_BANNED_IN_CHANNEL

throws.description: You were blocked by this user
throws.name: USER_IS_BLOCKED

throws.description: Bots can't send messages to other bots
throws.name: USER_IS_BOT

throws.description: You blocked this user
throws.name: YOU_BLOCKED_USER
